mapper.select: select * from TA_POPUP_MNG order by popup_mng_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select * from TA_POPUP_MNG where
create_date between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( subject like "%${searchWord}%" or content like "%${searchWord}%" or create_id like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by popup_mng_idx desc limit #{page}, 10

select count(*) from TA_POPUP_MNG
where create_date between "${startDate} 00:00:00" and "${endDate} 23:59:59"
and
( subject like "%${searchWord}%" or content like "%${searchWord}%" or create_id like "%${searchWord}%" )
order by popup_mng_idx desc
